org.openimaj.experiment.dataset.sampling

Class GroupSampler<KEY,INSTANCE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.experiment.dataset.sampling.GroupSampler<KEY,INSTANCE>
  • Type Parameters:
    KEY - Type of groups
    INSTANCE - Type of instances
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sampler<GroupedDataset<KEY,? extends ListDataset<INSTANCE>,INSTANCE>>

    public class GroupSampler<KEY,INSTANCE>
extends Object
implements Sampler<GroupedDataset<KEY,? extends ListDataset<INSTANCE>,INSTANCE>>
    Sampler that samples whole groups from a GroupedDataset. Groups are either selected randomly or from the first ones returned by the iterator over the dataset keys.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroupSampler(int numGroups, boolean random)
      Construct the sample to extract the given number of groups, either randomly or by taking them in the order provided by the iterator of groups.

    • Method Summary

      Perform the sampling operation on the given data and return the sampled dataset.

      • sample

        public static <KEY,INSTANCE> GroupedDataset<KEY,ListDataset<INSTANCE>,INSTANCE> sample(GroupedDataset<KEY,? extends ListDataset<INSTANCE>,INSTANCE> dataset,
                                                                                       int numGroups,
                                                                                       boolean random)
        Sample a dataset with the given number of groups to select. Groups are either selected randomly or from the first ones returned by the iterator over the dataset keys.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset to sample
        numGroups - the number of groups
        random - should the sample groups be chosen randomly?
        Returns:
        the sampled dataset
